title: From Illiteracy to Entrepreneur
story: After completing our adult literacy program, Meera started her own tailoring business and now employs three other women from her village.

title: First Generation College Graduate
story: With our scholarship support, Arjun became the first person in his family to attend university. He now works as a software engineer and mentors other students.

title: Village Transformation
story: Our mobile education unit brought learning to a remote village of 500 people. Today, 95% of children attend school regularly and literacy rates have doubled.
